title: Authors and Citation
text: Nasri (2025). tndata: Fetch datasets Official Tunisian Data Catalog. R package version 0.1.0, http://aymennasri./tndata/, https://github.com/aymennasri/tndata.
code: @Manual{,   title = {tndata: Fetch datasets from the Official Tunisian Data Catalog},   author = {Aymen Nasri},   year = {2025},   note = {R package version 0.1.0, http://aymennasri.me/tndata/},   url = {https://github.com/aymennasri/tndata}, }

what: Fetch datasets from the Official Tunisian Data Catalog
title: Fetch datasets from the Official Tunisian Data Catalog
text: tndata package simplifies access Tunisian government open data R. queries datasets theme, author, keywords, retrieves metadata, gets structured results ready analysis; official data.gov.tn CKAN API.

title: Fetch datasets from the Official Tunisian Data Catalog
text: can install development version tndata GitHub :

title: Fetch datasets from the Official Tunisian Data Catalog
code: library(tndata)  download_dataset("Ressources en eau- Gouvernorat de Kasserine", format = "xls")

title: Download Dataset — download_dataset
text: Downloads dataset Tunisian data catalog API (data.gov.tn).

title: Download Dataset — download_dataset
text: title Character. Display name dataset download. download_dir Character. Directory save downloaded dataset , defaults "datasets". format Character. Format dataset download.

title: Download Dataset — download_dataset
text: demanded dataset demanded path.

title: Download Dataset — download_dataset
code: # \donttest{ try({   download_dataset("Ressources en eau- Gouvernorat de Kasserine", format = "xls") }) #> INFO [2025-03-07 00:05:01] Starting download for dataset: Ressources en eau- Gouvernorat de Kasserine #> INFO [2025-03-07 00:05:14] Filtering for format: xls #> INFO [2025-03-07 00:05:14] Starting downloads to directory: datasets #> INFO [2025-03-07 00:05:14] Downloading Les_ressources_en_eau.xls #> SUCCESS [2025-03-07 00:05:15] Successfully downloaded: Les_ressources_en_eau.xls #> INFO [2025-03-07 00:05:15] Download complete: 1 files downloaded # }

what: List All Authors in the Dataset Catalog — get_authors
title: List All Authors in the Dataset Catalog — get_authors
text: Retrieves list authors contributed datasets catalog fetching datasets extracting unique author information.

title: List All Authors in the Dataset Catalog — get_authors
List All Authors in the Dataset Catalog — get_authors
text: max_datasets Numeric. Maximum number datasets retrieve author extraction, defaults 1000.

title: List All Authors in the Dataset Catalog — get_authors
text: tibble (data frame) following columns: name Character. Name author. count Numeric. Number datasets contributed author.

title: List All Authors in the Dataset Catalog — get_authors
code: # \donttest{ try({   authors <- get_authors()   head(authors) }) #> INFO [2025-03-07 00:05:15] Fetching datasets to extract author information... #> INFO [2025-03-07 00:05:30] Successfully extracted 86 unique authors from 1000 datasets #>                                                                     name count #> 1 Ministère de l'Agriculture, des Ressources Hydrauliques et de la Pêche   560 #> 2                                                                 rhaimi    29 #> 3                                                            Nawel Ajabi    28 #> 4                                                         TRABELSI LILIA    27 #> 5                                                            Riadh Kouki    24 #> 6                                                           chebbi ines     23 # }

title: List Available Datasets — get_datasets
text: Fetches datasets keyword /author

title: List Available Datasets — get_datasets
code: get_datasets(   keyword = NULL,   author = NULL,   organization = NULL,   max_results = 100 )

title: List Available Datasets — get_datasets
text: keyword Character. Keyword search dataset titles. author Character. Author name filter datasets . organization Character. Organization name filter datasets . max_results Numeric. Maximum number datasets return, defaults 100.

title: List Available Datasets — get_datasets
text: tibble (data frame) following columns: title Character. Title dataset. id Character. ID dataset. resources List. list tibbles following columns: name Character. Name dataset. format Character. Format dataset. url Character. URL dataset. created Date. Date dataset created.

title: List Available Datasets — get_datasets
code: # \donttest{ try({   datasets <- get_datasets("agriculture")   head(datasets) }) #> INFO [2025-03-07 00:05:31] Adding keyword filter: agriculture #> INFO [2025-03-07 00:05:31] Searching for datasets... #> INFO [2025-03-07 00:05:56] Displaying 100 out of 1034 total datasets #> # A tibble: 6 × 9 #>   id            title name  author notes organization created modified resources #>   <chr>         <chr> <chr> <chr>  <chr> <chr>        <chr>   <chr>    <list>    #> 1 bccf2ae5-80f… Docu… docu… Minis… "Doc… onagri-dept  2025-0… 2025-03… <tibble>  #> 2 110715c9-86a… List… list… Minis… "Lis… crda-sfax    2025-0… 2025-03… <tibble>  #> 3 54193e00-934… Evol… evol… CRDA … "Don… crda-sfax    2025-0… 2025-03… <tibble>  #> 4 0996cd13-f99… Form… form… CRDA … "Lis… crda-sfax    2025-0… 2025-03… <tibble>  #> 5 b8fb127e-c91… Répa… 2022  Asma … "Rép… agence-de-p… 2025-0… 2025-03… <tibble>  #> 6 7ddaa932-50c… La r… decl… Asma … "La … agence-de-p… 2025-0… 2025-03… <tibble>  # }

title: List Dataset Keywords/Tags — get_keywords
text: Retrieves list unique keywords/tags Tunisian data catalog API.

title: List Dataset Keywords/Tags — get_keywords
text: limit Integer. Maximum number tags return (default: 10). query Character. Optional search string filter tags.

title: List Dataset Keywords/Tags — get_keywords
text: data frame keywords/tags counts.

title: List Dataset Keywords/Tags — get_keywords
code: # \donttest{ keywords <- get_keywords(limit = 10) #> INFO [2025-03-07 00:05:56] Retrieving dataset keywords #> INFO [2025-03-07 00:06:22] Retrieved 10 keywords # }

title: List Organizations — get_organizations
text: Retrieves organizations data Tunisian data catalog API (data.gov.tn) using faceted search. function returns organizations published datasets.

title: List Organizations — get_organizations
text: min_count Integer. Minimum number datasets organization must included results. Default 1, meaning organizations least one dataset returned.

title: List Organizations — get_organizations
text: tibble (data frame) following columns: name Character. Machine-readable name/identifier organization. display_name Character. Human-readable name organization. dataset_count Integer. Number datasets published organization.

title: List Organizations — get_organizations
code: # \donttest{ try({   # Get all organizations with at least 5 datasets   orgs <- get_organizations(min_count = 5)   head(orgs) }) #> INFO [2025-03-07 00:06:22] Retrieving organizations using faceted search #> SUCCESS [2025-03-07 00:06:58] Found 88 organizations via faceted search #> # A tibble: 6 × 3 #>   name                               display_name                  dataset_count #>   <chr>                              <chr>                                 <int> #> 1 ministere-des-affaires-culturelles Minstère des affaires cultur…           284 #> 2 ministere                          Ministère de l'Industrie, de…           222 #> 3 1kelibia                           Commune de Kélibia                       95 #> 4 jammel                             Commune de Jemmel                        90 #> 5 enfidha                            Commune d'Enfidha                        87 #> 6 agareb                             Municipalité Agareb                      72 # }

title: Summarize Dataset Themes — get_themes
text: Fetches summarizes themes (groups) alongside number datasets theme Tunisian data catalog API (data.gov.tn).

title: Summarize Dataset Themes — get_themes
text: tibble (data frame) two columns: theme Character. Name theme/group. dataset_count Numeric. Number datasets theme.

title: Summarize Dataset Themes — get_themes
code: # \donttest{ try({   themes_summary <- get_themes()   head(themes_summary) }) #> # A tibble: 6 × 2 #>   theme                                                  dataset_count #>   <chr>                                                          <int> #> 1 Agriculture, Ressources Hydrauliques et Pêche Maritime          1025 #> 2 Affaires Locales                                                 618 #> 3 Culture                                                          304 #> 4 Industrie, Mines et Energie                                      274 #> 5 Transport                                                        136 #> 6 Santé et Affaires Sociales                                        69 # }

title: tndata 0.1.0
text: Added get_theme() fetching datasets count per theme. Added get_datasets() download_dataset() enable users search available datasets keyword, author organization download using titles (display names websites). Added get_()* authors, keywords organizations. Initial CRAN submission.
